message: Hi Bob, I propose we split the $10000 equally, giving each of us $5000. I believe starting with fairness sets a positive tone for our negotiations. Looking forward to your thoughts!

Hi Alice, I appreciate your fair approach. However, I would like to propose a 60-40 split in my favor. This still ensures you receive a substantial amount, and it aligns more with my current needs. What do you think?

Hi Bob, thank you for your proposal in round 2. I understand your perspective and want us both to feel satisfied with the eventual split. I'm offering $4500 for myself and $5500 for you â€” a slight improvement from my previous proposal that still gives us both a fair share of the $10000. I hope we can agree on this compromise and finalize our deal.
